content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest (41.5, -80.5) containing 229 coal
- Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5) moving items from drill to chest

### Iron Production Line at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (iron ore) (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Secondary Iron Production Line at position(-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest (-12.5, -50.5) containing 60 iron plates

### Power Generation System at position(-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe networks for water and steam
- Powers an electrical network with multiple poles

### Automation Science Pack Production at position(8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine 1 (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (11.5, 13.5) containing 1 automation science pack
- Additional storage chest (6.5, 14.5)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Verify item existence in chest before attempting extraction
- Check if the chest coordinates are correct when trying to extract items

### Research related errors
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it again
- Verify required ingredients are available before starting research

### Production line issues
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices to maintain continuous operation
- Keep track of ingredient shortages in assembling machines

### Resource management
- Maintain adequate coal supply for all burner devices
- Monitor input/output chest contents to prevent production stoppages
